name: Hodaya Nurelyan
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Full Stack Team Leader with over a decade of experience in software engineering.

about.p1: Hi! I'm Hodaya Nurelyan – a Full Stack Developer, Team Leader, and lifelong tech enthusiast with over 12 years of experience (but who's counting?).

about.p2: Throughout my career, I've built complex systems, smart platforms, websites, and digital products – basically anything that can go from idea to reality with some code and a lot of thoughtful design. I love turning complicated challenges into simple, elegant solutions that not only work smoothly but also look great.

about.p3: I'm a strong believer in lifelong learning and truly enjoy mentoring junior developers. I'm always striving to grow – both technically and personally. I thrive in dynamic, agile environments and enjoy the challenge of solving complex problems while transforming them into intuitive, user-friendly experiences.

about.p4: The mix of creativity and technical precision is what drives me – bringing ideas to life, exploring new technologies, and staying endlessly curious, and when I'm not writing code... I'm probably just thinking about the next one.

highlights: Specialized in software engineering and AI
Led a final project using React and TensorFlow
Built full-stack apps with React, Node.js, and TypeScript
Learned advanced component architecture and state management

projects.name: AI Resume Booster
projects.description: מערכת לחיזוק קורות חיים בעזרת GPT
